sections.paragraph: + Son of Ahab king of Israel. (2 Kings 8:16,25,28,29; 9:14,17,21-23,29) [[750]Jehoram, 1] + Son of Jehosphaphat; king of Judah. (2 Kings 8:21,23,24; 1 Chronicles 3:11; 2 Chronicles 22:5,7; Matthew 1:8) [[751]Jehoram, 2] + A priest in the reign of Jehoshaphat. (2 Chronicles 17:8) + A Levite, ancestor of Shelomith, in the time of David. (1 Chronicles 26:25) + Son of Toi king of Hamath. (2 Samuel 8:10) [[752]Hadoram] + 1 Esd. 1:9. [[753]Josabad, 3]
